pages.text: Cats are finicky things. Even so, their mere presence is soothing to many.$(br2)When bound as a $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiar$(), Cats will greatly help with $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Rituals$().$(br2)In addition, Creepers and Phantoms will stay away from witches with a Cat $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiar$().
